basics.name: Sergio Acosta Quintana
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer | Cloud & AI
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with industry experience building scalable enterprise systems and AI-driven SaaS platforms. Proven track record at IKEA modernizing legacy PL/SQL to Spring Boot microservices, reducing processing time by 55%. Skilled in Cloud-Native architectures, RAG implementation, and designing event-driven systems for high-volume environments.

work.name: BITBOX S.L (IKEA)
highlights: Architect and maintain critical backend systems for IKEA's loyalty operations, supporting 100+ internal users and managing 400,000+ active credit cards across multiple markets.
Spearhead the migration of legacy monoliths to Spring Boot microservices, significantly improving CI/CD deployment speed and production fault tolerance.
Engineered a unified automated workflow replacing 7 legacy PL/SQL batch jobs, cutting data processing time by 55% and eliminating 40+ monthly hours of manual support.
Implemented an event-driven microservices architecture using Kafka and REST APIs to ensure scalable, real-time data synchronization between distributed systems.

projects.name: NEXO CLOUD
highlights: Designed a cloud-native ETL pipeline for document ingestion, processing, and semantic indexing from scratch.
Deployed a production-ready RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system, integrating hybrid search (Keyword + Vector) and LLM synthesis.
Optimized vector embedding generation and storage strategies to maximize retrieval accuracy while minimizing cloud infrastructure costs.

education.institution: University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
